=== Introduction ===

It turns these:

http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CR_CreateDelegate/Screenshots/Before.png

...into these...

http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CR_CreateDelegate/Screenshots/After.png

=== Download === 
Primary download is http://www.rorybecker.me.uk/DevExpress/Plugins/Community/CR_CreateDelegate/

=== Usage ===
Place your caret on the signature of the method and select "Create Delegate" from the Smart tag menu. 

http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CR_CreateDelegate/Screenshots/SmartTagMenu.png

This item will be in blue as it is implemented as a CodeProvider.
